oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charlotte Robertson Napier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Napier is the daughter of Charlotte Reeves Robertson, who was among the earliest settlers to live in Middle Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Napier, Charlotte Robertson
Portrait paintings; People; Women
